Ingredients.3: 3 cups cooked, cubed chicken breast meat

Ingredients.4: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of celery soup

Ingredients.5: 1 (4 ounce) jar diced pimento peppers, drained

Ingredients.7: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans French-style green beans, drained

Ingredients.9: 1 cup water chestnuts, drained and chopped

Directions.1: Combine water and wild rice in a saucepan, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 50 minutes, or until tender.

Directions.2: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).

Directions.3: In a large bowl, toss together the cooked rice, chicken, cream of celery soup, pimentos, onion, green beans, mayonnaise, water chestnuts, salt, and pepper. Transfer to a 3 quart casserole dish.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until heated through.
